add_label_bottom_sheet.name: Name
add_label_bottom_sheet.no_labels_available:
No labels available.
Create a new label first.

anonymous_login.description:
Your data will be stored as long as you stay signed in. When you sign out, your data will be erased.

You can always upgrade to a regular account later on.
anonymous_login.title: Anonymous Login

anonymous_logout.description:
You are going to delete all your data right now. Proceeding now will permanently remove all your books.

 Do you want to proceed?
anonymous_logout.title: Anonymous Logout

book_management.restore_detail: Choose merge if you want to preserve the books on your device and complement the collection with the missing books in the backup. Or chose overwrite to completely delete all the books on your device and replace them with the books in the backup file.
book_management.title: Book management

book_notes.subtitle: Write down your thoughts, feelings or some general remarks about {title}

book_progress.error_current_page: Current page cannot be greater than page count

email_in_use_description: Your mail address is already associated with a Google Account. Please login via Google to use this account.

empty-states.read: There are no finished books. Why not finish one?
empty-states.read-later: You have currently no books that you can read. Go add some.
empty-states.reading: Why are you not reading a book now?
empty-states.wishlist: You have not added a book to your wishlist yet.

login_with_account: Login with your account to synchronize your books with other devices.
password_too_short: Password must have at least 6 digits!

random_book.description: Can't decide which book to read next? We've got you covered. Let us decide for you what you should read next.
random_book.title: Pick Random Book

recommendations.error:
Oh no! An error occurred while trying to fetch your recommendations. Please try again later.

Reason: {}

report.title: {} is reported. You will no longer see this recommendation.

recommendations.new-banner: New recommendations will be available again at the {}.

report-dialog.content:
Do you really want to report the book {}?

You will no longer see this book as a recommendation.
report-dialog.title: Report recommendation

recommendations.success: Wonderful. Your recommendation will be shown to other users. Thank you!

reset_password_text: A link will be sent to your registered email address with instructions on how to reset your password.

empty.description: Nothing found. Should we search online?

search.page-hint: Start typing to search your library!

danger_zone.delete_account_description: Deleting your account will permanently delete all your books. There is no way to restore your data.
danger_zone.delete_account_error: We were unable to delete your account. Please login again and try deleting it again.
danger_zone.delete_account_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
danger_zone.title: Danger Zone

share-book: Hey! I am currently reading {title} from {author} and I find it awesome!

timeline.empty: There are no books in your library yet to build this view.
